name: Giant (itch) (MMG)
description:
Giants is a quick-paced strategy game, players must lure the enemy giants into a close-range then unleash a special attack to take them all down in a perfectly timed team attack. Leaving just one alive means we are doomed and that's game over!

This game was made by 3 people :

me as programmer

S.Doyly as 2D Artist

 https://sleepyufo.itch.io/ as Composer and SFX Designer

and Voice over was created by our great friends :

Johnny Yang, Kevin Hou, Angela Xu, Nelson Lee

Everything is created during jam period

from scripts to sounds to voiceOvers to 2D designs

we only used 3D Assets and few sound effects :

Giant by Silvano Junior

Environment by Lylek Games & maxparata

Shaders by Michal Piatek & The Developer(https://thedevelopers.tech/)

the sfx that we didn't make our selves are form:  https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
